p: It has been experimentally verified that saikosaponins (a, b 2, c, and d) ( Figure 12), which are naturally produced triterpene glycosides isolated from herbal medicines such as Chinese thoroughwax ( Bupleurum spp., belonging to the family Apiaceae), parsley tree ( Heteromorpha spp., belonging to the family Apiaceae), and Figwort ( Scrophularia scorodonia, belonging to the family Scrophulariaceae), have antiviral activity against HCoV-22E9, a species of CoV that infects humans and animals and together with human coronavirus OC43 is one of the common-cold viruses [ 17]. Such natural molecules effectively suppress and deter the early process of infection by HCoV-229E, including viral penetration and attachment, after co-challenge with the virus.
